practice_phrases: Your eyes
你的眼睛
I like your eyes
我喜欢你的眼睛
Your eyes are kind
你的眼睛善良
She has your eyes now
她现在有你的眼睛
Your eyes are the only real hope
你的眼睛是唯一真正的希望
I'm waiting to see your eyes
我在等待看你的眼睛
Since the second day, your eyes have been sick
从第二天起，你的眼睛一直生病
Whatever he says, your eyes make me happier
无论他说什么，你的眼睛让我更开心
There are many reasons to consider your eyes the least serious
有很多理由考虑你的眼睛最不认真
Nothing would make me happier than to see your eyes at the end of the holidays
没有什么比在假期结束时看到你的眼睛更让我开心的了
